name: The Exile
flower_description: A withered flower worn on the shirt. Its former owner insisted on wearing it even in exile, so it must mean something.
feather_description: Not an actual accessory per se. Just a random bird feather that was found somewhere in the wilderness by the exile.
sand_description: Even after the crystal watch face was shattered and the hands lost, its former owner kept it until the end.
goblet_description: A dull goblet made of a heavy metal. It was once inlaid with gemstones, but they have since been stripped off.
circlet_description: A prestigious circlet. However, the royal insignia has been scratched out, and it is no longer the symbol of distinguished status that it once was.
four_pc_bonus: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 2 Energy for all party members (excluding the wearer) every 2s for 6s. This effect cannot stack.
